scripts.build:usa: npm run build prod.usa.eng.uf && npm run build prod.usa.chi.uf
scripts.build:can: npm run build prod.can.eng.uf && npm run build prod.can.chi.uf
scripts.build:sgp: npm run build prod.sgp.chi.uf && npm run build prod.sgp.eng.uf
scripts.build:ind: npm run build prod.ind.idn.uf && npm run build prod.ind.eng.uf
scripts.build:mys: npm run build prod.mys.mla.uf && npm run build prod.mys.chi.uf && npm run build prod.mys.eng.uf
scripts.build:hkg: npm run build prod.hkg.eng.uf && npm run build prod.hkg.chi.uf
scripts.build:twn: npm run build prod.twn.eng.uf && npm run build prod.twn.chi.uf
scripts.build:aus: npm run build prod.aus.eng.uf && npm run build prod.aus.chi.uf
